body.name: LANE LINEN Queen Comforter Set – 7 Piece Bed in a Bag – Pinch Pleated Queen Size Bedding Set with Comforter, Flat Sheet, Fitted Sheet, 2 Pillowcases & 2 Shams – Soft Pintuck Bed Set - Dark Grey
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 21 mins
Or fastest pickup Thursday, February 15. Order within 21 mins
features: Complete Bedding Set: Fulfil all your bedding requirements with Lane Linen’s 7 Piece Queen Bed in a Bag. Includes: 1 Comforter (88"x88"), 1 Flat Sheet (90"x102"), 1 Fitted Sheet (60"x 80"x14"), 2 Pillow Cases (20"x 30") and 2 Pillow Shams (20"x26").

Elegance Redefined: Suit any home décor, with our complete Queen Bedding Comforter Set. Merging pinch pleats and geometric patterns, it transforms your space into a stylish retreat. Experience the exceptional softness of the fine brushed microfiber sheets, pillowcases & shams, for a satisfying feel ever time you rest.

Year-Round Comfort: Experience cloud-like comfort throughout the seasons. This queen size comforter set strikes the perfect balance between weight and warmth, featuring down alternative materials for insulation without added bulk.

Versatile Bed Set: Our complete Bedding Set is available in a diverse range colours and sizes, making it a perfect fit for any theme and décor. It can be used by all age groups and is a perfect gift set for your loved ones on any special occasion.

Effortless Maintenance: Lane Linen's unique dyeing technique and premium microfiber fabric ensure resistance to fading, shrinking, and seam slippage. You can machine wash with cold water separately on gentle cycle and tumble dry on low.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comparable To Five Star Hotel Bed Comforters
reviews.reviewText: The Lane Linen Queen Comforter Set ensures that you have a comfortable comforter set to achieve a quality night's rest. The Lane Linen set essentially is a bed in a bag minus the bed that comes with a comforter, flat sheet, fitted sheet, two pillow cases, and two pillow shams. The 7-piece set is vacuumed packed to conserve space when shipped. As soon as you wash and dry the set (specifically the comforter), it should fluff right back up. The materials of the fitted sheet and pillow cases are of microfiber that feels soft and comfortable on your skin. It washes up really well in the washer with no fading or discoloration. I would recommend, however, to NOT use fabric softener as it may leave a permanent stain on the microfiber material as the fibers absorb the waxy residue on the softener. As far as drying the comforter from the washer, I leave it to hang until it dries naturally and then pop it in the dryer for just a couple of minutes to fluff it up and remove any remaining moisture. There were issues on discoloration or damage to the comforter from the dryer. The Lane Linen comforter does have a soft, fluffy, and lightweight feel and keeps me warm through the night for a good night's sleep. Although the comforter is breathable and lightweight, I've never felt cold through my sleep. I am not sure if I like the geometric pinched pleats design but it doesn't really bother me at all. I guess if you wanted a uniquely designed set this would be it. But I would prefer the "no-pleat" design if it were available. In case you are wondering, the Lane Linen uses microfiber which is lightweight, soft, with a smooth and slippery texture. It's almost similar to soft smooth suede and does have good heat retention properties which is ideal if you live in colder climates. My Lane Linen fitted sheet did not shift around when tossing and turning at night nor did I experience any bunching on the materials. This is great because I hate having to fix and adjust my fitted sheets every morning when I wake up.Reasons To Purchase:✅ Excellent High-Quality Materials✅ Soft, Lightweight, And Warm✅ Creates A Luxurious Bedroom Aesthetic✅ Great ValueReasons To Avoid:⛔️ Geometric Pinched-Pleats May Be Mistaken For Wrinkles⛔️ Fabric Softener May Leave Permanent Stains On Sheets

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Elegant & comfortable - sweet dreams are made of THIS!
reviews.reviewText: I absolutely LOVE this comforter set! The design is beautiful with a simple elegance and the color is the perfect shade of "French Blue". It's high quality, especially considering the price, and very well-made. The pin-tuck stitching is flawless. Despite the raw silk-like aesthetic, the fabric is lightweight, super soft and very comfortable. Since I'm using it in my guest room, I've only washed it twice, on gentle cycle and then air fluff to dry. It still looks brand new - not a single pill, loosened thread or frayed edge.I can happily and highly recommend this bedding set - and the value is exceptional.This review is for the following item: LANE LINEN Queen Comforter Set – 7 Piece Bed in a Bag – Pinch Pleated Queen Size Bedding Set with Comforter, Flat Sheet, Fitted Sheet, 2 Pillowcases & 2 Shams – Soft Pintuck Bed Set - French Blue - $48.99

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Natural Fabric, Soft and Comfy with a Nice Added Texture
reviews.reviewText: Just wow!!This Lane Linen comforter set is seriously impressive. It's like stepping into a fancy hotel room every night, minus the room service bill (thank goodness!).First things first: the look. Pinch pleats and geometric patterns? Chef's kiss. It's chic, modern, and somehow timeless all at once. The image you sent doesn't even do it justice – the texture is insane! It instantly elevated my whole bedroom from "meh" to "magazine-worthy."But it's not just about the looks (although, let's be real, those are on point). This comforter is like a giant fluffy cloud. The down alternative filling is warm and cozy without being suffocating, perfect for our unpredictable weather. And the sheets? Oh, the sheets! Buttery soft and cool against the skin – I didn't even know bedding could feel this luxurious.Speaking of practicality: the 7-piece set comes with everything you need, from the comforter and sheets to the pillowcases and shams. Everything washes beautifully (bonus points for being machine-washable!) and hasn't faded or shrunk a bit. Plus, the different colors and sizes available mean you can find the perfect fit for any style or bedroom.Sure, it might be a bit on the pricier side. But considering the quality, the comfort, and the fact that you're basically getting an entire hotel room makeover in a bag, I'd say it's worth every penny. Trust me, your future self will thank you when you're snuggled up in this cloud-like paradise every night.In a nutshell, If you're looking for a comforter set that's stylish, comfortable, and built to last, look no further than Lane Linen. It's a 5-star sleep experience, guaranteed.

For the price, I mean you are not going wrong with this buy. Might not be as super puffy as some other comforters though, but still very decent. Warm but light feeling. The seams style hides any actual wrinkles lol. Looks great.Really like this bedding set!Have not tried the sheets on yet.The king size fits perfectly on our 10 inches mattress. Not overly long on each side.
The pink is such a soft pink it's really pretty!!! It's very soft too. I bought it in grey as well and it's just as good but not as good because this colour is really beautiful.
Comfortable , warm , not light , but but heavy either , the whole set is pretty good , not cheaply made like some
So comfy , light weight but gives that hotel bed feeling !
